creator: hchan@datawave.ca
text:
after I created a webapp and added that to server.xml with a
reloadable="true" attribute, it takes about 10 seconds or so
for my servlet changes to be picked up
10s is *TOO* long.  This should be configurable
This is not a bug. Changing severity to enhancement request.
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: In 5.5.x onwards (haven't checked older versions) this is configurable voa the backgroundProcessorDelay attribute.
